### Read in TRY data
```{r}
library(dplyr)
require(data.table)

TRYdata <- fread("~/fs_ed/SERDP_Project/Cogongrass_trait_sampling/cogongrass_PDA/TRY_data/20646.txt", header = T, sep = "\t", dec = ".", quote = "", data.table = T)


trait_id <- c(11, 3115, 3116, 3117, 3085, 3086)
TRY_standard_val_sla <- filter(TRYdata, is.numeric(StdValue)) %>%
                                filter(TraitID %in% trait_id)

```
